page.title: 06A MORNING IN PEMBROKE.
page.content: I live just inside the grid we have been studing.It is mostly open countryside. On school days I get up at 8 o'clock but sometimes a bit later.As soon as I get up I put the television on.I then get dressed into my school uniform.It consists of a blue and gold tie,a white blouse,a navy blue skirt and a royal blue jumper.I go to{Priory {Junior School,Monkton,Pembroke. } At a quarter to nine I go to school.I walk down my street,Merchant's Park,up the main road;then I cross over the road to {Monkton Infants' School.}My school is just around the corner.I get to school at about 9 o'clock.
